name: Orbitorbi
description:
ORBITORBI is a game that's been in development for a long while! 

This is a technical demo, the full version will be out in around 2 weeks. Made in collaboration with Tiffany Li.

Press P to see controls in game.

Controls are A,S,D,F,G,H,J, and K keys, and the space bar. Click the mouse to zoom in and out of the player.  You hold a key and press space to launch in that direction. You start with the F key and hold the space button to launch yourself in the direction of the spinning orb. Unlock other rotating orbs by collecting yellow coins. Try it out!
